inn1.comm: runs first up, as Lee strays on to the pads and Sehwag tucks to square leg
top start, pitching on a length and lifting away from Tendulkar, who leaves
good length, much straighter, Tendulkar plays it back to Lee, hurriedly
this one comes in from off stump, off a fuller length, Tendulkar defends to the off side but the ball dies at his feet, he sets off for a hurried single but gets wisely sent back by Sehwag
back of a length, smack on the dime, no room to work with and Tendulkar quickly gets back and across to defend it back to Lee

lifter, as Lee bends his back and gets Tendulkar hopping in his crease, the ball hitting a short length and curling past him as he arches the back and gets the head out of harm's way ... terrific delivery to end a top over
first runs off the bat, Sehwag tucking one off his pads past square leg
short of a length, outside leg stump, turned towards midwicket
poor ball, outside leg stump and Sehwag turns it down to fine leg
this one's fuller and coming back in from off stump, forcing a forward defensive from Tendulkar, a better length from Bracken
holds back the length and Tendulkar, in a flash, reads it and gets across to cover off stump, forcing the ball to point off the back foot ... he has so much time
short one outside leg stump, he tries to pull but mistimes it off the glove into the gap at square leg
good length, as Lee looks for movement away, but Tendulkar gets onto the front foot and smothers the ball to cover, Lee moving to his left to field
good length again, this time Tendulkar waits on the back foot and gets back to defend
back of a length, again he's ready for it and dabs wide of backward point
back of a length, as Lee oversteps, and Sehwag plays off the back foot to cover ... we have the first free hit of the game
and he cant cash in, as he ducks under a short one from Lee that goes over his left shoulder ... maybe he forgot about the free hit rule?
first boundary, as Sehwag chases a slower one, mistiming it over the bowler's head but with the small boundaries at the Gabba the ball just trickles down
strays onto middle and leg and Sehwag taps it to square leg to end the over
smart single, Tendulkar playing a good-length ball on off stump with soft hands, dabbing in front of point and calling for the run, well backed-up by Sehwag too

played on! Sehwag gets his back foot across marginally and tries to cut one just too close to the body, which comes back in very late, and he can only chop back onto his stumps, handing Bracken and Australia the early initiative ... that shot was not on given the ball wasn't wide enough and he was just undone by the manner in which it jagged back into him
beaten, as he pushes from the crease to one that holds its line and goes on just past the outside edge of the bat, well bowled, Bracken
comes into him off a shorter length and he tucks it to midwicket
gets off the mark, tucking one off the body into the gap
pushes one across him and he chases it, edging in the air but wide of the slips and the ball races away to the third man boundary
back of a length, pacy delivery, going away from the left-hander and gaining height for Gilchrist to take it pretty high ... there's lift in this pitch today
back of a length again, but Lee's working closer to off stump, inch by inch, and a confident Gambhir gets across and decides to leave it be
thats wider, pitching full and Gambhir easily leaves it be
straighter one, pitching on a good length and he hurriedly pushes to cover
short one outside leg stump, tucked off the hips to square leg, Gambhir wants one but Haddin is sharp and fires a direct hit to get him back in crease
good ball, good leave, Gambhir getting across to cover off stump as the ball nips off a perfect length for Gilchrist to collect
good length, middle and stump, he gets forward and defends
short one and Tendulkar pulls from outside off through midwicket, the ball slows down and the batsmen settle for three
short in length, coming in from middle stump, played to midwicket
good length, curling in from off stump, he gets bat down in time and works it across towards square leg, but no chance of a single
good length again, off stump, no room on offer and he defends it back

oh thats close! Gambhir sees a fuller one sliding down and goes for a booming drive off the pads, but ends up with a leading edge that ends up going wide of Hopes at extra cover ... the ball was in the air for a while but alls well in the end
shot of the day so far, as Gambhir leans into a good-length delivery, driving on the up through the covers, top shot
the response is predictably a shorter one, but he's waiting on the back foot and opens the face of the bat, running wide of gully for one

now thats something we don't see very often! Lee pitches back of a length, Tendulkar gets back and across in his crease, getting in line to play it across to square leg, but in the process he ends up trodding on his stumps ... he stands his ground as the decision is referred upstairs, even as Lee lifts his hand in celebration, and he obviously has to go ... talk about being caught on the back foot ... India's openers are back inside cheaply
back of a length on off stump, he gets back and defends to point
back of a length again, Rohit gets back and defends to point again
tad shorter, with good lift to Gilchrist as Rohit leaves it be
back of a length outside off stump, he gets across and shoulders arms
slower one, coming in off a length, the offcutter, Gambhir dabs to gully
shorter one, coming into his ribs, he plays it well off the hips to midwicket
back of a length, gently moving into middle and off, Rohit plays off the back foot
this one pitches on a length and goes across him, off a lovely channel, beating him as he turns in his crease and pushes down the wrong line
good length on middle and off and he defends it back to Bracken
top shot, as Gambhir puts away a short and wide one, smack past gully
short and wide again, this time he plays it uppishly, flashing hard, and gets two down to third man .... Noffle a bit nervous, it seems
still too wide and Gambhir cuts to backward point, not past the fielder
thats another loose delivery and Gambhir slams it over cover for four more
still short and a touch wide, allowing Gambhir to get up and dab wide of slip
back of a length, Rohit gets in line and plays it back off the back foot
nips back in from middle stump and Gambhir eases it off the pads
back of a length, middle and leg, he's tucked up and defends it back
lovely shot, getting off the mark with a pleasing front-foot offdrive, on the up, between extra cover and mid-off ... should ease the nerves a tad
edged but it doesn't carry, as Rohit drives hard at the slower one, angled across him, but the ball drops in front of Hussey at second slip
better shot, as he gets across and runs one down past gully and Hussey
back of a length, tidy delivery on the stumps draws a defensive to end the over
get across and tries to cut one too close to his body, edging almost to Hayden
back of a length on off stump, he gets tall and runs it to Hussey this time
gets a full one and unleashes a flashing square-drive, again on the up off the front foot, this time through a diving Hussey at point
short and wide and cut out to the man running across from third man, Hopes, who fumbles and allows four right through his legs, would you believe?
better delivery, back of a length on off stump and Rohit defends
again, back of a length on off and Rohit gets back and across to defend
back of a length outside off stump, nipping away, Gambhir leaves
thats a loose one, pretty wide outside off stump but not called
this one gets some extra bounce and beats his angled bat, as he tries to steer it down to third man
now he's successful in his previous attempt, opening the face and running it through the gap at gully for a single
pitches outside leg and he tries to flick, but gets undone by the lift
back of a length on middle and off, he gets back and pushes past Johnson, calling for the single and running well to get it, nice rotating of the strike
back of a length outside off stump, he decides to leave this one be
slides down leg off a short length, Rohit plays a paddle off one leg and manages to work it wide of Gilchrist, to fine leg
overpitched on the pads and Gambhir flicks out to deep midwicket
shorter length, sliding down the pads and again the extra lift beats Rohit, who gets back and tries to nudge it away
back of a length, tidy delivery, and Rohit gets back and across to defend
ever so slightly, he pitches fuller, and Rohit gets forward to drive it back
just back of drivable length and he plays it back to Noffke
pitches very, very full as he looks for swing, Gambhir goes for a booming square drive but the bat comes down after the away-swinger passes

edged and dropped! Johnson pitches short of a length, Gambhir gets up and plays away from the body, getting a regulation outside-edge but Hussey drops a simple catch going forward at second slip .... by his extreme standards that was a regulation slip catch ... Ponting looks ticked
thats a wide, sliding down the pads

dropped again! By Ponting! Johnson looks on in frustration as Gambhir pokes at another short one and edges to first slip, where Ponting jumps up, gets hands on it, and allows it to pop out of his palms!
back of a length on off stump, Rohit gets forward and defends
back of a length, this time he waits in his crease and plays it back
strays down the pads and Rohit tucks it down to fine leg
short of a length outside off, he gets into position and defends to point

just short of third man! In a rush of blood, Rohit gives Noffke the charge and slashes up and over gully, down to third man where Hopes initially takes off in the wrong direction and cannot cover ground in time, the ball dying in front of him as he dives forward
back of a length on off stump, pushed to the man at cover
back of a length, angling across Gambhir, who squirts it to point
errs in line, pitching on the pads and Gambhir tucks that wide of mid-on for three ... Noffle's woes continue
back of a length outside off, enough width for him to get back and steer it wide of the slips, a touch shot from the rookie
pitches on leg stump and comes in, catching him in front of but there's a thick inside-edge on that so Johnson's appeal is turned down
pitches on leg stump again and this time he tucks it towards midwicket
short of a length outside off, he rides the bounce and steers past gully
good delivery, pitching on middle and off and going away, Gambhir comes into an attempted on-drive but adjusts to play towards cover
digs in a short one, on the stumps, and gets a leading-edge from an airborne Gambhir, who again tries to work it to the on side
thats a terrific shot, as Rohit gets on top of a wide one and places the cut smack past cover and point, and third man has no chance of stopping that
short of a length on off stump, he hops and drops it in front of gully, Rohit calls for the risky single and they get it
bit of room and he slashes in the air over gully, one bounce to third man
straighter one, Gambhir on-drives a quick single to raise the 50-run stand
lovely response, Lee banging in a nasty short one that sits up and screams past his nose, but Rohit just arches the back and leaves it be, calm as ever

again a terrific short one, this time curling back over middle and off, forcing Rohit to really, really get low and Lee has a smile and advice for him ... all in good spirit, and that was again very well negotiated by the youngster
fuller delivery and he plays a good-looking drive to Symonds at cover
full on off stump, the slower one, well picked by Gambhir as he flicks it past midwicket for a couple more to the total
wide one, inviting the cut but he gets low and watches it through to Gilchrist
short and wide and he slashes over gully, one bounce to Hopes at third man
super shot, as he square-drives a full delivery through cover and point ... this kid can bat, and its so far been a good decision to promote him up to No. 4
short one slides down the pads and he tucks it off the hips for one
full on off stump, he uses his feet and drives to extra cover
short one on off stump, he waits on the back foot and uses the soft hands to place it in front of point, calling for the single, superb response from Gambhir too
thats the fuller one, swinging into off stump, Gambhir digs it back to Lee
well bowled, the attempted yorker, again well played back to Lee
short one outside off, doesn't sit up much but Gambhir ducks low
good length on off stump, pushed to point off the front foot and Rohit responds excellently to the call for one, hustling hard to the other end
superb lifter, screaming past the outer edge of the bat as Rohit gets airborne, but Lee's overstepped so we have a second free hit inside the Powerplay
again they cannot put Lee away, as Rohit makes room to leg but ends up missing a short one that bounces over his shoulder ... two chances gone begging
good shot, as Gambhir takes a full delivery from off stump and drives past the stumps and mid-on, beating the fielder and making its acquaintance with the long-on ropes

rapped on the pads and he's gone! Johnson gets one to nip back in and Gambhir, playing across the line, gets struck in front middle stump, dead in front and umpire Steve Davis shoots up the finger ... an enterprising 65-run stand is snapped
back of a length, comes back in and he plays from the crease, to point
fuller one, beating him as he stands rooted and drives from the crease, a good change-up, quicker one and going away from the right-hander
pitches outside leg stump and he tucks it to square leg
off the mark in ODIs, as Johnson bangs in a short one outside leg stump that surprises Tiwary, but he gets up and uses one hand to drop it into the gap at short fine leg
short outside off stump, he gets tall and drops it at his feet
short one, too wide but Tiwary takes his eyes off it and ducks his head low
good length, nipping back in to Tiwary, who plays to Hussey at point
he's giving him the right work-over, is Lee, banging in another short one over the stumps that has Tiwary ducking under it again
good shot, superb stop, Tiwary crunching a short one very hard but Clarke intercepts at backward point, diving to his left and stopping runs
edged and gone! Lee strikes, forcing Rohit to drive at one not there for this shot, and the lack of footwork results in a thin edge through to Gilchrist
back of a length outside off stump, Tiwary drives from the crease to point
slower one, back of a length, he gets across to cover off and defends
pitches outside leg stump, swings on high to rap him on the flap as he attempts to work it away
short of a length on middle and off, Tiwary gets tall and tucks to midwicket
back of a length, pitching outside leg, flicks the pads and runs into the gap
good length outside off, bringing Dhoni onto the front foot and he pushes to cover to end the over ... India have two new men at the crease, one on debut and the other searching for form.
another short one, over middle and leg, getting Tiwary into a tangle

cleaned em up with a beauty! You had to see this one coming, after a series of short ones, as Lee lands a lovely yorker to a leaden-footed Tiwary, not moving his feet at all from deep in the crease, and his stumps are disturbed ... the debutant goes for 2 and India are in tatters
off the mark straight away, shuffling across and on-driving a full one to midwicket and calling for the run
pitches on a good length, Dhoni gets onto the front foot and drives to cover
fuller one, middle and leg, turned wristily into the gap behind square for three
back of a length just outside off, Uthappa gets over it and defends
good length, pushed across Dhoni, who comes forward and leaves
sharper one, sitting up as it angles across Dhoni, who again leaves
back of a length again, he gets across and leaves again, top bowling
short one, going across Dhoni as he gets tall and drops the hands
another short of a length one and Dhoni has no shot to offer
fuller one to end the over, Dhoni gets forward and drives to cover
straight on the stumps, he gets across and shuffles to work a couple through midwicket, which raises the 100 for India
back of a length outside off stump, he gets forward and shoulders arms
slips down leg stump, clips the thigh pad so wide is not called
back of a length on middle and leg, he gets in line and drives to mid-on
shorter one on off stump, he gets across and tucks it to midwicket
short of a length just outside off, too close to cut and so he leaves it be
good length on middle and leg, going down but he falls over in his shot and the ball dribbles to cover
back of a length outside off stump, he shoulders arms off the front foot
pushed across him off a length, again drawing a leave from Uthappa
shorter one, Uthappa gets right over it and drops it at his feet, Johnson advances and Uthappa yells out a firm 'NO!' to his captain and partner
straighter one, he works it across the line to midwicket, who's sharp there
short of a length, Dhoni gets across to off stump and pushes to point

maiden wicket for Noffke as India slip further! The extra bounce does it for Uthappa, getting airborne and trying to tuck it to leg, instead getting a leading-edge that pops up in the air to Clarke at point ... that really sat up near his nose and surprised him
short outside leg stump, worked off the hips into the gap as he gets off strike
back of a length, Dhoni hops across to off and defends it down watchfully
back of a length on off stump, he works it across the line to midwicket
short one outside off stump, 132ks, Dhoni gets up and leaves
just drifts onto middle and leg and Dhoni tucks backward of square for two
back of a length on off stump, Pathan gets in line and drives to cover
pushes a shortish one to cover and sets off but Dhoni quickly sends him back as two fielders descend
short of a length on off stump, he gets up and plays it back to Hopes
back of a length, angling away, he drives nicely to mid-off this time
edged wide of gully, Pathan playing away from his body but picking the gap, there were cries of ooh and ah as the ball flew threw the vacancy
back of a length on off stump, Dhoni gets across and plays it back to Hopes
pitches on leg stump, Pathan gets an inside-edge onto pad and calls for one
short of a length, 132ks, Dhoni covers off stump and leaves
fuller on middle and leg, he shuffles and on-drives to midwicket
short one on off, he gets right across his stumps in an attempt to paddle it into the gap at short fine leg, but the ball runs off his gloves and into his left pad
gets across again and succeeds in getting bat on this ball, tucking into the gap
quick single, as Pathan flicks a full one from middle and off to midwicket
another run, Pathan tucking one to mid-on this time
fuller one and Dhoni meets it with a drive into the covers for one more
good length just outside off, Pathan gets to the pitch and drives to cover
shorter one, no pace at all and Pathan is early into his flat-batted shot, ends up carving into the ground back to Hopes
gets a shortish one and again chops into the ground, this time to point
good length on off stump, he gets forward and defends it back to Hopes
back of a length, he gets across and plays to extra cover
back of a length, he gets in line and defends to cover this time
banged in short down leg stump, he pulls uneasily into the gap at square leg
back of a length on off stump, pushed off the front foot to point
tries to work a fuller one, slower too, across the line and it balloons up in the air and doesn't carry to Bracken, diving forward from mid-on
straighter one, middle and off, he inches forward and defends it back
good length outside off stump, he comes forward and drives to mid-off
again uses his feet and drives but cannot beat Symonds at extra cover
straighter one, he gets across and works it to square leg, on the hop
back of a length, he gets in line and drives to extra cover
walks across and drives a good-length delivery back to Hopes' left side
gets across to off stump and defends this one to point
tossed up on off stump, Dhoni gets forward and drives to cover
flatter one on off stump, he turns it across the line to midwicket
quicker one, spins into him as he backs away to leg and has to play it back
drifts down the pads and he flicks it away for a quick single
tossed up outside off, Pathan eyes the yawning gap at midwicket and flicks across the line, getting an easy single
flat on middle and off, he makes room and drives into the covers
walks across the stumps, driving a full one to Hussey at point, who misfields
comes down the track, making room to drive a good-length delivery into the covers, where Symonds reacts superbly and jumps up to save runs
good length on middle and off, he drives back to Hopes, who stops it
gets some width outside off stump but mistimes the shot to Symonds
short one but stays low, Pathan pulls across the line from outside off and under-edges towards short fine leg
good length outside off stump, Dhoni gets forward and drives it back
spins down leg stump, Gilchrist appeals for the stumping off a wide with Pathan's back foot well grounded ... not sure what he was making noise about
flatter one outside off stump, Pathan punches that into the covers
tossed up, the arm ball, Pathan sweeps from off stump as Clarke appeals
short and flat, spinning down but Dhoni mistimes his drive to midwicket
loops it down leg stump, Dhoni gets over it but cannot work it away
quick and flat on leg stump, he makes room and works it to midwicket
tossed up on off stump, Dhoni drives off the front foot to cover
back of a length outside off stump and Pathan finds the gap at extra cover
fuller one, Dhoni drives well and Symonds gets a hand on it at extra cover to deny what looked like a boundary
back of a length, some width there, tapped towards Symonds back on the ring and after some hesitation from Dhoni he gets a single
nips in off a length and catches him high above the knee roll, down leg stump, and he responds to Pathan's call for one ... there was a bit of bat on that it seems
back of a length, gets forward and pushes wide of the fielder
banged in short, he pulls but can't beat the man back at deep backward square
short and flat on off stump, Dhoni smashes it back on the bounce
bit of room outside off stump and he bludgeons it into the covers
flat and a touch short and he cuts from off stump through the covers
flat again, no spin, off stump, Pathan pushes to cover
flat on leg stump, spins down further and he works it to square leg
charges down, swiping across the line but mistimes it through midwicket
beaten, as he hits a tough length and Pathan feels for it from the crease
and again, Pathan just doesn't get to the pitch and gets beaten on the drive
back of a length, this one coming back in and Pathan drives it back to him
uses his feet in an attempt to counter the swing, chipping to midwicket
gets some width and carves over gully, raising the first four in ages
gets a single by opening the face of the bat and nudging to third man
back of a length on the stumps, Dhoni tucks it to midwicket for a sharp run

edged and gone...or not! Pathan heaves at one just outside off stump, there's a huge nick as Gilchrist and Noffke go up in celebration but umpire Rudi Koertzen reckons bat hit ball ... replays show the edge and thats a poor decision
fuller one on the stumps, he advances and drives a single to mid-on
drifts onto middle and leg and Dhoni on-drives to midwicket
oh he's smacked the underpants off that one! Pathan gives himself room and goes inside-out, flat-batting six over extra cover

now thats gone! Pathan drives one towards mid-on, sets off for the single but Dhoni sends him back as Ponting swoops in, collects, and fires in a direct hit to get rid of him ... he didn't ground his bat and just continues running on to the dressing room
back of a length on off stump, gets across and squirts it to point
strays onto middle and leg, he gets up and flicks to square leg

edged and dropped! Harbhajan flirts at one rising outside off stump and gets a thick outside edge, Gilchrist leaps to his right and gets fingers on it but spills the chance, and his to-be replacement Haddin dives at third man to save four
drills a full one into the ground at cover, where Ponting fields well
gets some width and opens the face, with soft hands, to it run to third man
full one, close to being a yorker, Dhoni tucks it to midwicket and sets off, Harbhajan isn't interested but yields to his captain, and it was a simple run in the end
straight one on the stumps, easy pickings for Dhoni, who turns it to fine leg and some excellent running between the wickets gets India three
short of a length outside off stump and he cracks the cut to point
thats a better shot, Harbhajan punching a fuller one down the ground
short of a length on off stump, Dhoni gets back and drives to extra cover
comes down the track, Hopes sees him coming and adjusts the length, Dhoni drives through extra cover but wisely chooses not to take on Symonds' arm
short and wide, and Harbhajan cuts in the air down to third man
top shot, advancing and clipping one off the pads excellently over midwicket for a couple-bounce four, all timing in that effort from the tail-ender
slower ball, Bracken rolling the fingers over that one, keeping it full and Harbhajan can only drive it back to his right
sees him walking across the stumps and fires one well down leg stump
slower one on a length, Harbhajan picks it well and square-drives past point
fires in the attempted yorker, Dhoni twirls the bat as only he can and chips it back over Bracken's outstretched hands ... there was two there but they were slow completing the first
walks across the stumps, Bracken bowls a canny slower one and Harbhajan mistimes the drive back to him, beating his fingers
full on off stump and he drills that down to long-off for one
now thats a rank full toss way outside off stump and he can only carve it out to the man fielding on the cover ropes
better delivery, back of a length on off stump, Dhoni gets across and plays it back from the crease to Johnson ... a dot ball!
back of a length again and this time he works it toward midwicket for one
short and wide, he cuts hard in the air just to the right of Clarke, leaping at backward point, and Hussey does the covering up in the deep
walks right outside off stump, eying fine leg, Johnson cleverly pitches short and Harbhajan cops it in the .... erm ... midships as he swings across the line ... ouch ...

bangs it in short and this time he connects well, going up and over cover, the ball lands safely and they should have taken three ... but well ... he did take it hard that last ball .. every run counts though
comes down and slashes over cover and point, the ball dropping safely  between two fielders giving chase
good delivery, length on off stump, driven past Bracken for one
well played, Harbhajan walking across the stumps and paddling into the gap at fine leg, the ball rolls and dribbles over the ropes
four more! Harbhajan! Sees the width, gets down on bended knee, and smashes it along the ground through a diving extra cover ... the Gabba cheers
walks down and takes a low full toss towards mid-on, Dhoni hustling and making sure they get two ... but Harbhajan is struggling
slower one outside off stump, he gets down and carves to midwicket
gone, just like that! Dhoni gets across and twirls a full delivery outside off stump straight to Ponting at extra cover, handing Lee his fourth for the evening
gives himself room and slashes one to extra cover, then sprints off
and he gets five! Harbhajan gets under a short one and slogs it up in the air, the mistimed shot balloons up and Clarke keeps his eyes on it at point
bowls a length ball and Sreesanth slogs, one-handed, to midwicket
attempted yorker doesn't come out right, Ishant makes room and gets a french cut past leg stump

gives himself room to leg stump, slamming it through cover, they get a comfortable two but Sreesanth tries one more after Lee fumbles the collection, only to get run out easily off the last ball of the innings

inn2.comm: back of a length outside off stump, seams away as Gilchrist leaves
back of a length again, he reaches out and dabs it to point
short of a length, he gets across and turns it from off stump to midwicket
gets some width, and gets Australia on the board with a dab past cover and point, no stopping that one
fuller one, swinging away superbly after sucking Gilchrist into a drive from the crease ... exaggerated seam position on that one
full on the stumps, he tries to on-drive but escapes with a leading-edge into the gap at gully
short and very, very wide and Gilchrist needs a ten-foot pole to get there ... well, not really but you know what I mean ... and slashes over to gully
back of a length, leg stump, worked to Rohit at square leg
just too short and thats duly cracked off the back foot past point, its not timed to perfection but some hard running gets three more to the total
back of a length, jagging back in and he opens his account with a nudge to leg
back of a length on off stump, he gets in line and pushes to cover
back of a length, worked across Gilchrist, who opts to leave
good length, on the money, and Hopes presents a textbook defensive
pitches well outside leg stump and thats called wide
back of a length, outside leg stump, tucked to Rohit at square leg
firm punch to a fuller delivery, hit cleanly back to Pathan's left, and even though he took some pace off it the ball carries on past mid-on for four
bang, thats four! Hopes swivels and connects superbly on his flat-batted pull in front of square leg
and again, he gets up on one leg and pulls backward of square this time, and with the man yards inside thats four more, top shot that!
as you can see with that wide one well outside leg stump
lovely shot, Hopes whipping a full one from off stump right through midwicket
short of a length on the stumps, Gilchrist gets across and plays it back
back of a length, hint of movement, Gilchrist squirts to Tiwary at point
attempted yorkers ends up a full toss and he drills that back between Sreesanth's  legs and the fast outfield takes care of the rest ... boof!
goes flashing outside off stump and misses, to Sreesanth's frustration
and again, the back foot not really getting across as he chases one angling away outside off stump and misses ... 126ks, good change of pace

and he walks! Gilchrist chases a short one down leg stump, there's deviation before Dhoni takes it to his right ... appears he gloved it ... Sreesanth semi appeals but there's no reaction from Steve Davis ... but Gilchrist puts his head down and heads inside, so India have an early wicket ...thats not something we see in these times, a batsman walking.
sharp one, sits up and jags into Hopes' ribs, he's in a mess but Dhoni doesn't back up his bowler, instead fumbling and giving away runs ... its a no-ball to boot, so we have a free hit
swing and a miss from Hopes, backing away and flashing the bat at it
beaten as he fishes at a length ball outside off and gets done in by height
back of a length on off stump, good stuff, Hopes gets behind to defend

bowled 'em! Thats a peach, the ball pitching back of a drivable length and seaming back in sharply through the huge gap between bat and pad to disturb the stumps ... Hopes plays forward and is simply beaten by an immaculate seam position
sharp movement again, this one jagging back off a shorter length, 137ks, and catching Clarke on the hop, smack in the midriff
good ball, good leave, Clarke shouldering arms to another that zips up from nowhere
full and wide, swinging away sharply outside off stump, called a wide
back of a length on off stump, getting Ponting pinned in his crease as he defends it towards midwicket

and he's gone for a duck! Sreesanth gets his man, hitting a great length and getting the ball to lift and seam away ever so sharply, sucking Ponting into a fatal prod and Sehwag, from second slip, plucks it in front of Tendulkar at first
good ball first up, pitching on a length and coming in, he takes one hand off the bat and leaves it be
good length, nipping in again and Symonds defends from the crease
thats a waste, as he bounces him over leg stump and the ball sails away, going over Dhoni as well, at some speed, and Sreesanth apologizes

yowza! Thats a peach to end an aggressive over, as he changes the pace and pitches it up, forcing Symonds to feel for it as the ball holds its line and narrowly misses kissing the outer edge of his bat
full delivery outside off stump, Clarke gets to the pitch and drives to cover
back of a length outside off, comes back in, he gets in line and defends
short of a length, he gets back and cracks to Rohit in the covers
short again, sitting up and he gets surprises, almost playing it back to Ishant
back of a length and wider, allowing Clarke the time to leave it be
almost! Clarke reaches out a wider one and gets off the mark with a streaky two runs, nearly dragging back on to his stumps
short of a length, just down leg stump, and wide is the call
top shot, just crunched from the crease but so hard that it flies past cover
sharp movement back in, clipping him high over the stumps and the ball races through gully and down to third man, off the inside-edge
